lead_paragraph: The blogosphere is abuzz this afternoon with a story about Monica Gaudio, a writer who found an article she wrote in 2005 about the evolution of English apple pie recipes in a food magazine called Cooks Source. The issue? Ms. Gaudio said she had never been contacted by the publication about using her article.  Thanks to the Internet, the debate has been playing out on the likes of  Twitter and Facebook and the author’s own LiveJournal page, where Ms. Gaudio wrote about how she tried contacting the publication after a friend told her he had seen her article in it. headline.main: A Social Media Firestorm About Apple Pies
